= Installation =

To install MT4 Liquidity Indicator please download the latest version from my  
[https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwBMSNJd3y5MQ1E3TTF0ZTZPVjg&usp=sharing#list Google drive] and unpack to your MetaTrader\MQL4.

Then copy configuration, which you would like, from MetaTrader\MQL4\Libraries\Configuration to MetaTrader\MQL4\Libraries and then rename it to MT4LiquidityIndicator.Net.dll.xml.
